target.name: createSite
target.echo: ...adding js subdirectory from jsmoljs and js
...adding standard j2s JavaScript classes from j2s/
...moving swingjs/j2s jsjava and jsjavax JavaScript files from bin
...adding to swingjs/j2s all other JavaScript files from bin
...adding customized js from JSmol but not java.awt.event
...adding to swingjs/j2s property files from src (for CalendarData)
removing j2s globals Class and JavaObject
...removing all $fz references for sub/superclass common private function names
...changing Clazz.pu$h() to Clazz.pu$h(self.c$) (only a partial fix)
creating and compressing core files - warnings are OK; "does not exist" is trouble
